Product Designer / Blogger

I am based in Stockholm with 3+ years of experience in UX research, visual design and prototyping on B2B and B2C products. In my recent role, I worked on a learning analytics platform for aiding teaching process in schools.

In my spare time, I write on Medium about UX and UI and mentoring new students starting in UX.

How about a portfolio glance in a nutshell?

Project Details
Research and Lo-Fi
Visual Design
Testing
Outcomes

Project 1 - Real Time Classroom Analytics

Challenge: Easy and effective "Real Time Anaytics" to aid teaching in classrooms as well as remotely

EdAI Tech - 4 weeks

UX Research: Past results from PhD team, student interviews, teacher workshop/observation using MVP

Lo-fi: Paper sketches

Visuals: Mockups in Figma for Student and Teacher interface using Highcharts "visualizations" for data visualization

Prototype: Click and animated prototype in Figma

Workshop/Observation with teachers and a pilot test study to collect data for AI features

One school started longterm pilot test. Acquisition of several schools as customers with the MVP.

(I can only talk in general terms as the product is still under development)

Project 2 - C2C cuisine experience platform

Challenge: Presenting local cuisine as a full food experience for everyone

University Project - 2 months (Later modified to a startup idea)

UX Research: 5 in person conversations and competitive analysis

Lo-fi: Designed in Figma

Visuals: Mockups in Figma

Prototype: Click prototype and front-end implementation

Usability tests and demonstration via setting up a real sale

Was able to drive a sale with the idea. MVP test validated the concept.

Read in-depth case study üßê

Project 3 -Study bot (Phased out now)

Challenge: Automating the personal coach with a chatbot who can prepare and help students to remain on their study schedule

Oheyo - 1 week Design Sprint

UX Research: 5 in person conversations and review analysis from customer service

Lo-fi: Designed conversations

Visuals: Mockups in Sketch

Prototype: Click prototype in Principle

Usability tests

Satisfaction for the scenarios covered and increase in course completion rate

Read in-depth case study üßê

Project 4 - 360¬∞ Video Rental Tour

Challenge: Creating trust b/n tenants and landlords in sharing economy using 360¬∞ VR

Etttak AB - 4 months (Research thesis)

UX Research: 5 in person conversations and academic literature study

Lo-fi: Designed in Figma

Visuals: Filming a 360¬∞ of a landlord

Prototype: Prototype in Unity 3D

Usability test with 6 Particpants

Strong favor for 360¬∞ Video VR as a more compelling medium to build trust wiht landlords and 2D pictures of houses on rental websites. VR needs mainstream success for more adoption.

Read in-depth case study üßê

üéÅ Resources for Your Design Work

Design and Collaboration? Making it work.

Since EdAI Tech was a newly formed startup, I combined various methods from companies like Basecamp and own experience to come up with a framework for us. I generalized it.

Feel free to take bits or whole for your own design process.

Guest lecture slides in UX Research

This was guest lecture that I gave at a UX workshop organized by Inicio. I gave an overview of importance of UX research and various methods that sutdents could employ depending on the projects.

The Challenge

Result

360¬∞ Video VR User Research Rental Market

Creating trust in a rental sharing economy

Research Thesis Project with Etttak AB, Stockholm

The Challenge

Building trust among the students and the landlords leading to an intention to rent

Result

Strong favor for 360¬∞ VR over regular platforms and better preparedness to meet face to face with the landlord
